title: Intelligence - not working :?
body: the utility master intelligence doesn't seems to be working atm, at least not with the coin, I have it maxed, yet coin is still 40 sec cd, this seems to only started occurring after the latest patch 5.11? why? bug?

replies.body: I'm looking into it, if i can confirm it i'll try poking a few peeps.

Could not reproduce.
Tested in game with a chronometer, Talisman of Ascension has a 32 second cooldown when used with 3 points of Intelligence (actual reading was 32.43 because my reaction time is shit in the morning).
This was verified on a custom 1v0 game, playing Ekko for additional time swag. If you can reproduce the bug in other modes, please mention it.

(ps. the item text always says 40 seconds, despite the time being different. It's not supposed to change)
screenshot won't cut, id have to get a recording of the whole 40 sec and the masteries
